  • Also included within the visual arts1 are the applied arts2 such as industrial design, graphic design, fashion design, interior design and decorative art
  • 3

visualize /ˈvɪʒuəlaɪz/ UK US

Định nghĩa:
to form a picture of somebody/something in your mind [synonym] imagine Hình dung, mường tượng (vật không thấy trước mắt).
Ví dụ:
  • Try to visualize him as an old man
  • I can't visualize what this room looked like before it was decorated.

vital /ˈvaɪtl/ UK US

Định nghĩa:
necessary or essential in order for something to succeed or exist,extremely important Sống còn, quan trọng
Ví dụ:
  • Reading is of vital importance in language learning.
  • It's absolutely vital that you do exactly as I say.

vulnerable /ˈvʌlnərəbl/ UK US

Định nghĩa:
weak and easily hurt physically or emotionally dễ bị tổn thương
Ví dụ:
  • Old people are particularly vulnerable to the flu
  • She looked very vulnerable standing there on her own.

wage /weɪdʒ/ UK US

Định nghĩa:
a particular amount of money that is paid, usually every week, to an employee, especially one who does work that needs physical skills or strength, rather than a job needing a college education Tiền lương được trả, thường là mỗi tuần, cho nhân viên, đặc biệt là những người làm việc đòi hỏi kỹ năng hoặc sức mạnh thể chất chứ không phải là công việc cần có bằng đại học
Ví dụ:
  • a very low/high wage
  • an hourly/daily/weekly/annual wage
  • He gets/earns/is paid a good wage, because he works for a fair employer.
  • The job pays very low wages.

waist /weɪst/ UK US

Định nghĩa:
the part of the body above and slightly narrower than the hips Chỗ eo,chỗ thắt lưng
Ví dụ:
  • He put his arm around her waist.
  • These trousers are a bit tight around my waist.

warehouse /ˈwerhaʊs/ UK US

Định nghĩa:
alarge building for storing things before they are sold, used, or sent out to shops, or Kho hàng
Ví dụ:
  • The goods have been sitting in a warehouse for months because a strike has prevented distribution

waste /weɪst/ UK US

Định nghĩa:
materials that are no longer needed and are thrown away Vật thải ra, vật vô giá trị không dùng nữa
Ví dụ:
  • household/industrial waste
  • toxic wastes
  • waste disposal (= the process of getting rid of waste)

waterproof /ˈwɑːtərpruːf/ UK US

Định nghĩa:
not allowing water to go through Không thấm nước
Ví dụ:
  • Treat them with oil to make them waterproof.
  • a waterproof jacket

wear and tear /ˌwer ən ˈter/ UK US

Định nghĩa:
the damage that happens to an object in ordinary use during a period sự hao mòn và hư hỏng
Ví dụ:
  • The insurance policy does not cover damage caused by normal wear and tear.
  • The living-room carpet has to stand up to the combined wear and tear of two dogs and three children.

wear away [sound:Speak (6). mp3] UK US

Định nghĩa:
to become, or make something become, gradually thinner or smoother by continuously using or rubbing it bào mòn đi, xóa mờ đi
Ví dụ:
  • The inscription on the coin had worn away
  • The steps had been worn away by the feet of thousands of people.

weigh /weɪ/ UK US

Định nghĩa:
to measure how heavy somebody/something is, usually by using scales to consider something carefully before making a decision Cân, nhấc xem nặng nhẹ Cân nhấc, đắn đo.
Ví dụ:
  • He weighed himself on the bathroom scales
  • You must weigh up the pros and cons (= consider the advantages and disadvantages of something)
  • She weighed up all the evidence.

weightless /ˈweɪtləs/ UK US

Định nghĩa:
having no weight or appearing to have no weight, for example because there is no gravity Không nặng, không có trọng lượng
Ví dụ:
  • Astronauts work in weightless conditions

weightlessness /ˈweɪtləsnəs/ UK US

Định nghĩa:
the fact of having or appearing to have no weight, for example because there is no gravity Tình trạng phi trọng lượng. Tìng trạng phi trọng lực.
Ví dụ:
  • an experience of weightlessness

well-informed /ˌwel ɪnˈfɔːrmd/ UK US

Định nghĩa:
having a lot of knowledge or information about a particular subject or things in general Có đủ tài liệu, biết rõ; thạo tin
Ví dụ:
  • He was well informed and shrewd, with good, calm judgment.
  • How well informed is the customer about the range, quality, and cost of the products on offer?

wholesale /ˈhoʊlseɪl/ UK US

Định nghĩa:
of or for the selling of goods in large amounts at low prices to shops and businesses, rather than the selling of goods in shops to customers bán buôn, bán sỉ
Ví dụ:
  • wholesale prices
  • a wholesale supplier/business
  • We only sell wholesale, not to the public.

widen /ˈwaɪdn/ UK US

Định nghĩa:
to become, or to make something greater in width Rộng ra, mở ra Làm cho rộng ra, nới rộng ra, mở rộng.
Ví dụ:
  • As it approaches the sea, the river begins to widen
  • Her eyes widened in surprise.

widespread /ˈwaɪdspred/ UK US

Định nghĩa:
existing or happening over a large area or among many people Lan rộng, phổ biến
Ví dụ:
  • widespread damage
  • The plan received widespread support throughout the country.

winding /ˈwaɪndɪŋ/ UK US

Định nghĩa:
having a curving and twisting shape uốn khúc, quanh co, ngoằn ngoèo (sông, đường)
Ví dụ:
  • a long and winding road

windmill /ˈwɪndmɪl/ UK US

Định nghĩa:
a building with machinery for grinding grain into flour that is driven by the power of the wind turning long arms (called sails Cối xay gió; máy xay gió

wireless /ˈwaɪərləs/ UK US

Định nghĩa:
using a system of radio signals rather than wires to connect computers, mobile phones, etc to each other Không dây, rađiô
Ví dụ:
  • a wireless connection

wood /wʊd/ UK US

Định nghĩa:
an area of trees, smaller than a forest rừng
Ví dụ:
  • an oak wood
  • We went for a walk in the woods after lunch.

wooden /ˈwʊdn/ UK US

Định nghĩa:
made of wood Bằng gỗ.
Ví dụ:
  • a wooden box
  • The house was surrounded by a tall, wooden fence
  • Stir the mixture with a wooden spoon.

word processor /wɜːrd prɑːsesər/ UK US

Định nghĩa:
a computer that runs a programfor preparing documents and letters máy tính có chương trình soạn thảo văn bản

work ethic /ˈwɝːk ˌeθ. ɪk/ UK US

Định nghĩa:
the principle that hard work is a good habit and should be rewarded dịch từng chữ thì nó là “đạo đức công việc”, nhưng thực ra nghĩa đúng nhất là “tinh thần làm việc”
Ví dụ:
  • Bill's work ethic was never very strong
  • Người có work ethic tốt (good work ethic) là người siêng năng làm việc, làm việc chân thật, chất lượng cao
  • Good work ethic là một cum từ thường thấy trong các quảng cáo tìm nhân viên.

workforce /ˈwɜːrkfɔːrs/ UK US

Định nghĩa:
all the people in a country or an area who are available for work Lực lượng lao động
Ví dụ:
  • A quarter of the local workforce is/are unemployed.
  • an educated workforce

workplace /ˈwɜːrkpleɪs/ UK US

Định nghĩa:
the office, factory, etc where people work cơ quan, văn phòng, nơi làm việc
Ví dụ:
  • the introduction of new technology into the workplace
  • These safety standards apply to all workplaces.

workshop /ˈwɜːrkʃɑːp/ UK US

Định nghĩa:
a period of discussion and practical work on a particular subject, in which a group of people share their knowledge and experience một buổi thảo luận và thực hành về một chủ đề cụ thể, trong đó một nhóm người chia sẻ kiến thức và kinh nghiệm
Ví dụ:
  • a drama workshop
  • a poetry workshop

worldwide /ˈwɜːrldwaɪd/ UK US

Định nghĩa:
existing or happening in all parts of the world trên khắp thế giới
Ví dụ:
  • We have 2 000 members worldwide
  • In her new job she travels worldwide as a consultant
  • The band is famous worldwide.

worthwhile /ˌwɜːrθˈwaɪl/ UK US

Định nghĩa:
useful, important, or good enough to be a suitable reward for the money or time spent or the effort made Quan trọng, thú vị hoặc đáng bỏ thời gian, tiền của hoặc nỗ lực; đáng giá; bõ công.
Ví dụ:
  • The smile on her face made it all worthwhile.
  • If you need him on this project, you've got to make it financially worthwhile for him
  • She considers teaching a worthwhile career.

wrap /ræp/ UK US

Định nghĩa:
to cover something completely in paper or other material, for example when you are giving it as a present Bao, bao bọc, bao phủ, gói, quấn
Ví dụ:
  • He spent the evening wrapping up the Christmas presents.
  • individually wrapped chocolates

yield /jiːld/ UK US

Định nghĩa:
the total amount of crops, profits, etc that are produced Sản lượng, hoa lợi (thửa ruộng); hiệu suất (máy )
Ví dụ:
  • Crop yields have risen steadily
  • Yields on gas and electricity shares are consistently high.

Định nghĩa:
a long vegetable with dark green skin and white flesh quả bí ngồi
6
